titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation against making collections without license vnder the great seale.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at theCourt [sic] at Whitehall, this one and twentieth day of March, in the eighth yeere of the Reigne of our Souereigne Lord, Charles by the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
